MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CH44 postcode area of Wallasey affecting properties in Wilson Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:48AM.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site will need to isolate the power to other properties at 6:30PM and we expect the power to be restored by 9PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:35PM on 1st February 2021
